version.notes: Transition from multiple song book in a single file to a single one.
Initial version of Tenzi Za Rohoni with Subtitles

song.title: Mwokozi Umeokoa
song.subtitle: Precious Saviour

song.title: Twamsifu Mungu
song.subtitle: We Praise Thee, O God

verse.stanza: Twamsifu Mungu kwa Mwana wa Pendo,
Na moyoni uwashe moto wa Roho.

song.title: Hata Ndimi Elfu
song.subtitle: O for a Thousand Tongues to Sing

song.title: Jina la Yesu, salamu!
song.subtitle: All Hail the Power of Jesus' Name

song.title: Jina Lake Yesu Tamu
song.subtitle: How Sweet the Name of Jesus Sounds

song.title: Baba, Mwana, Roho
song.subtitle: Holy Holy Holy, Lord God Almighty

verse.stanza: Baba, Mwana, Roho, Mungu mwenye enzi,
Baba, Mwana, Roho, Mungu wa mapenzi,
Wewe u mwanzo, nawe u mwisho.
Baba, Mwana, Roho, sisi tu gizani,
Baba, Mwana, Roho, Mungu mwenye enzi,
Baba, Mwana, Roho, Mungu wa mapenzi

song.title: Ni tabibu wa Karibu
song.subtitle: The Great Physician Now Is Near

song.title: Taji Mvikeni
song.subtitle: Crown Him With Many Crowns

song.title: Yesu Kwetu Ni Rafiki
song.subtitle: What A Friend We Have In Jesus

song.title: Usinipite!
song.subtitle: Pass Me Not!

song.title: Nina haja nawe
song.subtitle: I Need Thee Every Hour

song.title: Ewe Roho Wa Mbinguni
song.subtitle: Spirit Divine Attend Our Prayers

song.title: Tafuta Daima Utakatifu
song.subtitle: Take Time To Be Holy

song.title: Yesu Kwa Imani
song.subtitle: My Faith Looks Up To Thee

song.title: Cha Kutumaini Sina
song.subtitle: My Hope Is Built On Nothing Less

song.title: Kumtegemea Mwokozi
song.subtitle: 'Tis So Sweet To Trust In Jesus

song.title: Namwandama Bwana
song.subtitle: When We Walk With The Lord

refrain.stanza: Amini utii, njia pweke ni hii
Ya furaha kwa Yesu: amini ukatii.

verse.stanza: Giza sina kwangu wala hata wingu

song.title: Akifa Yesu Nikafa Naye
song.subtitle: Dying With Jesus By Death Reckoned Mine

song.title: Ndiyo Dhamana, Yesu Wangu
song.subtitle: Blessed Assurance, Jesus Is Mine

song.title: Ninaye Rafiki Naye
song.subtitle: I’ve Found A Friend, Oh Such A Friend

song.title: Roho Yangu Hima
song.subtitle: Be Quick, My Soul, And Light Thy Lamp

verse.stanza: Roho yangu hima, na taa yako

refrain.stanza: Yesu yuko mbele, Yesu yu nyuma,

verse.stanza: Toka na mapema, mbele ya wote,

song.title: Ni Salama Rohoni Mwangu
song.subtitle: When Peace Like A River

verse.stanza: Dhambi zangu zote, wala si nusu,
Ee Bwana himiza siku ya kuja,

song.title: Mwokozi Moyoni Mwangu
song.subtitle: Since Jesus Came Into My Heart

verse.stanza: Sina giza tena, ila mwanga pia
Mlango wa Mbinguni ni yeye pia,

song.title: Nimekombolewa na Yesu
song.subtitle: Redeemed! How I Love To Proclaim It !

song.title: Yesu Unipendaye
song.subtitle: Jesus, Lover Of My Soul

song.title: Mungu ni Pendo
song.subtitle: God Is Love

song.title: Anipenda Kweli
song.subtitle: Jesus Loves Me, This I Know

song.title: Baba yetu aliye Mbinguni
song.subtitle: I Am So Glad That Our Father In Heaven

song.title: Nilikuwa Kondoo Aliyepotea
song.subtitle: I Was A Wandering Sheep

verse.stanza: Karibu ya kufa, kwa kiu na kwa njaa,
Aliosha taka zangu, dhambi nyingi sana;
Sasa nampenda Baba, na mchunga pia;
Hivi nyumbani mwa Baba sipotei tena.

song.title: Msingi Imara
song.subtitle: How Firm A Foundation, Ye Saints Of The Lord

song.title: Yesu Awakubali Wakosa
song.subtitle: Sinners, Jesus Will Receive

song.title: Dhambi Ikikulemea
song.subtitle: Come, Every Soul By Sin Oppressed

song.title: Njoni Wenye Dhambi
song.subtitle: Come, Ye Sinners, Poor And Wretched

song.title: Twende Kwake
song.subtitle: Come To Jesus Just Now

verse.stanza: Twende kwake, twende kwake, kwake Yesu sasa,
Sasa twende kwake, kwake Yesu sasa!
Njoo hima, njoo hima, kwake Yesu sasa,
Sasa njoo hima, kwake Yesu, sasa!

song.title: Anisikiaye Aliye Yote
song.subtitle: Whosoever Will

song.title: Waitwa, Mwovu, Na Bwana
song.subtitle: Beulah Land

song.title: Twende Kwa Yesu
song.subtitle: Come To The Saviour, Make No Delay

song.title: Mwenye Dhambi Huna Raha
song.subtitle: Come, Ye Sinners, Poor And Wretched

song.title: Nasikia Kuitwa
song.subtitle: I Hear Thy Welcome Voice

refrain.stanza: Unisafi kwa damu ya kwangikwa kwako.

song.title: Yesu Aliniita, "Njoo"
song.subtitle: I Heard The Voice Of Jesus Say

song.title: Kivulini mwa Yesu
song.subtitle: In The Shadow Of His Wings

verse.stanza: Kituo mbali na hamu, kituo kilicho tamu.
Furaha yenye fahari, ya kueneza habari.

song.title: Yesu Akwita
song.subtitle: Jesus Is Tenderly Calling Today

refrain.stanza: Yesu akwita kwa upole akwita leo.

song.title: Kukawa Na Giza Dunia Yote
song.subtitle: The Whole World Was Lost In The Darkness Of Sin

verse.stanza: Ni nuru za mbingu kondoo wa Mungu

song.title: Mtazame Huyo! Aliyeangikwa Juu
song.subtitle: There Is Life For A Look At The Crucified One

song.title: Twae Wangu Uzima
song.subtitle: Take My Life And Let It Be

song.subtitle: I Am Thine, O Lord, I Have Heard Thy Voice

song.title: Naweka Dhambi Zangu
song.subtitle: I Lay My Sins On Jesus

song.title: Nitwae Hivi Nilivyo
song.subtitle: Just As I Am Without One Plea

song.title: Yesu Nakupenda, U mali yangu
song.subtitle: My Jesus, I Love Thee, I Know Thou Art Mine

song.title: Mungu Twatoa Shukrani
song.subtitle: Father, We Thank Thee

song.title: Yote Namtolea Yesu
song.subtitle: All To Jesus I Surrender

song.title: Wewe Umechoka Sana?
song.subtitle: Art Thou Weary, Art Thou Languid?

song.title: Yesu Nataka Kutakaswa Sana
song.subtitle: Lord Jesus, I Long To Be Perfectly Whole

song.title: Nipe Moyo Wenye Sifa
song.subtitle: Oh For A Heart To Praise My God

song.title: Ni siku kuu siku ile
song.subtitle: O Happy Day That Fixed My Choice

song.title: Naendea Msalaba
song.subtitle: I Am Coming To The Cross

song.title: Mwamba Wenye Imara
song.subtitle: Rock Of Ages, Cleft For Me

song.title: Peleleza Ndani Yangu
song.subtitle: Search Me, O God, My Actions Try

song.title: Waponyeni Watu
song.subtitle: Rescue The Perishing

verse.stanza: Na kwa nguvu zake warudi kwake,

song.title: Tumesikia Mbiu
song.subtitle: We Have Heard

song.title: Bwana Wa Mabwana
song.subtitle: The Everlasting Gospel

song.title: Ujaribiwapo, Sifanye Dhambi
song.subtitle: Yield Not To Temptation

song.title: Safari
song.subtitle: Hold The Fort

song.title: Po Pote Mashamba Yajaa
song.subtitle: Far And Near The Fields

song.title: Bwana Uliyewaita
song.subtitle: Thou Who Didst Call Thy Saints Of Old

song.title: Mungu Msaada Wetu
song.subtitle: O God, Our Help In Ages Past

song.title: Twendeni Askari
song.subtitle: Onward, Christian Soldiers

verse.stanza: Kweli kundi dogo, watu wa Mungu
Sisi na mababa tu moja fungu.
Heshima na sifa ni ya Mfalme,

song.title: Yesu Atuchunga
song.subtitle: Jesus Is Our Shepherd

song.title: Mteteeni Yesu
song.subtitle: Stand Up, Stand Up For Jesus

song.title: Twendeni! Haraka!
song.subtitle: Speed Away! Speed Away!

verse.stanza: Liwe mwanga kwa nchi zilizo giza.
Pelekeni Injili kwa jina la Yesu.
La upendo wa Mungu kwa watu wote;

song.title: Yesu Zamani Bethrehemu
song.subtitle: Jesus My Saviour, To Bethlehem Came

verse.stanza: Akaja kwa mimi; akaja kwa mimi;
Ni la ajabu ya jinsi gani
Ni la ajabu ya jinsi gani

song.title: Wachunga Walipolinda
song.subtitle: While Shepherds Watched Their Flocks

song.title: Waimba, Sikizeni
song.subtitle: Hark, The Herald Angels Sing

song.title: Njoni, Enyi Wa Imani
song.subtitle: O Come, All Ye Faithful

verse.stanza: Njoni na furaha, enyi wa imani,
Mungu wa waungu, Mwanga wa mianga,
Mungu wa kweli, wala si kiumbe;
Jeshi la Mbinguni, Imbeni kwa nguvu,

song.title: Msalabani pa Mwokozi
song.subtitle: Down At The Cross

verse.stanza: Alinikomboa kwa damu, Mwana wa Mungu.
Kwake uuone uzima, Mwana wa Mungu.

song.title: Sioshwi Dhambi zangu
song.subtitle: What Can Wash Away My Sins

song.title: Wamwendea Yesu Kwa Kusafiwa
song.subtitle: Have You Been To Jesus For The Cleansing Power?

verse.stanza: Na kuoshwa kwa damu ya kondoo?
Na kuoshwa na damu ya kondoo?
Uwe safi kwa damu ya kondoo!
Na uoshwe kwa damu ya kondoo.
Na uoshwe kwa damu ya kondoo?

song.title: Chini Ya Msalaba
song.subtitle: Beneath The Cross Of Jesus

song.title: Sioni Haya Kwa Bwana
song.subtitle: At The Cross

song.title: Kwa Wingi Wa Nyama
song.subtitle: Not All The Blood Of Beasts

song.title: Niwonapo Mti Bora
song.subtitle: When We Survey The Wondrous Cross

song.title: Ni “Mtu Wa Simanzi”
song.subtitle: Man Of Sorrows, What A Name

song.title: Damu Imebubujika
song.subtitle: There Is A Fountain Filled With Blood

song.title: Deni Ya Dhambi Ilimalizika
song.subtitle: Jesus Paid It All

song.title: Ndiyo Damu ya Baraka
song.subtitle: Blessed Be The Fountain Of Blood

verse.stanza: Ndiyo damu ya baraka ituoshayo wakosa,
Kwake Bwana twaokoka, nasi twamsifu sasa;
Nioshe katika damu, takuwa safi kabisa.
Yesu alivikwa miiba, na kuangikwa Mtini,
Na maumivu si haba yaliyompata chini.
Nataka kijito hicho niende kuoga sasa;
Ndicho kinitakasacho, nami ni safi kabisa.
Baba, kweli nimekosa, moyo wangu ni dhaifu;
Dhambi ni nyingi kabisa, nipate wapi wokovu?
Yesu kijitoni pako, naja naamini sasa;
Nioshe kwa damu yako, takuwa safi kabisa.

song.subtitle: At Calvary

song.subtitle: Wounded For Me

verse.stanza: Siku ya Mbinguni kujawa na sifa,

song.subtitle: Lo, He Comes With Clouds Descending

song.subtitle: In The Sweet By-And-By

song.title: Kazi Yangu Ikiisha
song.subtitle: When My Life Work Is Ended

refrain.stanza: Nitamjua, nitamjua, nikimwona uso kwa uso;
Nitamjua, nitamjua, kwa alama za misumari.

verse.stanza: Nitamsifu mwokozi kwa rehema na pendo

song.subtitle: There Is A Better World They Say

song.title: Mungu awe Nanyi Daima

song.subtitle: New Every Morning Is The Love

song.subtitle: Lord Thy Word Abideth

song.title: Nilikupa Wewe Maisha Yangu
song.subtitle: I Gave My Life For Thee

song.title: Ni Mfalme Wa Mapenzi
song.subtitle: The King Of Love My Shepherd Is

song.title: Bwana Mungu, Nashangaa Kabisa
song.subtitle: How Great Thou Art

song.title: Kilima Kando Ya Mji
song.subtitle: There Is A Green Hill Far Away

song.title: Bwana U Sehemu Yangu
song.subtitle: Thou My Everlasting Portion

verse.stanza: Bwana u sehemu yangu, rafiki yangu wewe;
Katika safari yangu, tatembea na wewe;
Pamoja na wewe, pamoja na wewe,
katika safari yangu, tatembea na wewe.
na yanikute mashaka, sawa sawa na wewe.
Pamoja na wewe, pamoja na wewe,
heri nikute mashaka sawasawa na wewe.
mlangoni kwa mbinguni, niingie na wewe.
Pamoja na wewe, pamoja na wewe,
mlangoni kwa mbinguni, niingie na wewe.

song.subtitle: Souls Of Men, Why Will Ye Scatter

song.title: Liko Lango Moja Wazi
song.subtitle: The Gate Ajar For Me

verse.stanza: Waomba na jasho jingi likageuka damu.
Bila kosa ukalia, Baba yangu, wasamehe,
Leo umeshinda kifo, sasa wapaa Mbinguni,

verse.stanza: Na moyo hufurahi kwa Yesu wangu.

song.subtitle: Loved With Everlasting Love

verse.stanza: Jina lake liwe na sifa kuu.
